|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This datasheet (on EnGenius USA's site) indicates the device has 8MB Flash and 64MB RAM. :FCC photos show the device with a MX25L12845EMI-10G Fiash chip (128Mb / 16MB) :and two NT5TU32M16DG-AC RAM chips (DDR2-800, 64MB each). "EAP600-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board. :The device is using a HN2411CG LAN Transformer. Default settings (including the SSID formats) are per '''EnGenius''''s manual. :The info may not be 100% accurate.. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.engeniustech.com/business-networking/indoor-access-points-client-bridges/16598-eap600-new On EnGenius USA]
[http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/node/790 On EnGenius Singapore]
[http://www.engeniustech.com.sg/files/pdf/EAP600.pdf Datasheet] ==Vendor links== [http://www.keenansystems.com/store/catalog/product_info.php?cPath=2&products_id=360 On '''Keenan Systems'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
